tool.name: SAGA.shapes_polygons.22
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOLYGONS False isArrayATTRIBUTE False output_data_EDGES $output_data_EDGES name SAGA.shapes_polygons.22 POLYGONS $POLYGONS ATTRIBUTE $ATTRIBUTE EPSILON $EPSILON VERTICES $VERTICES DOUBLE $DOUBLE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_EDGES $OutputSection_EDGES.outputType_EDGES transmissionMode_EDGES $OutputSection_EDGES.transmissionMode_EDGES

param.name: POLYGONS
param.label: Polygons
param.help: Polygons The following data types are allowed in the txt file: vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml, json

param.name: ATTRIBUTE
param.label: Attribute
param.help: Attribute The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: DOUBLE
param.label: Double Edges
param.help: give output of an edge twice, i.e. once for each of the two adjacent polygons

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_EDGES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_EDGES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
